property.name: provisioner.server.uri
property.description: URI of server to connect to

property.name: provisioner.bind.ip
property.description: Local IP provisioner should listen on

property.name: provisioner.bind.port
property.description: Local Port provisioner should listen on

property.name: provisioner.register.ip
property.description: Routable IP for the server to call back to this provisioner's API

property.name: provisioner.daemonize
property.description: Run provisioner as a daemon. Ensure you also specify a log directory

property.name: provisioner.data.dir
property.description: Provisioner storage directory for plugin data resources

property.name: provisioner.capacity
property.description: Max number of running workers for this provisioner

property.name: provisioner.heartbeat.interval
property.description: interval in seconds to send heartbeat to server

property.name: provisioner.log.rotation.shift.age
property.description: number of old log files to keep, or frequency of rotation (daily, weekly, or monthly)

property.name: provisioner.log.rotation.shift.size
property.description: maximum logfile size. only applies when shift.age is a number

property.name: provisioner.log.level
property.description: log level, one of debug, info, warn, error, fatal

property.name: provisioner.worker.poll.interval
property.description: interval in seconds to poll server for tasks

property.name: provisioner.worker.poll.error.interval
property.description: interval in seconds to wait after unsuccessfully polling the server for tasks
